ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New quest in Firiona Vie
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Sylly.  I think.  :) Regarding the Iksar mask:  I have yet to discover any benefit that the mask gives other than the appearance.  It does not give
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Sylly. I think. :)

Regarding the Iksar mask: I have yet to discover any benefit that the
mask gives other than the appearance. It does not give regen. It may
give some sight advantage, but I haven't noticed. And since Iksars are
bigger than Half Elves, it's sometimes more annoying than not.

Plus I have to keep stifling the urge to show it off in the middle of
"good" cities. I remember making the mistake of converting myself to a
Dark Elf in the Ak'Anon bank. May have caused the biggest train ever in
Ak'Anon on our server.

Still, I love the reactions I get. And yes, Harbringer drops it in TT,
he only appeared once in the three days we were harvesting keys. I don't
know if that's typical, or if we were just not taking out his
placeholders.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 50 songs, Innoruuk
